sentences.en: " The forces of selfishness and of lust for power met their match "
sentences.cn: “ 自私和贪嗜权力的势力遇到了劲敌 ”

sentences.en: A bloody , demonical lust so unnatural you knew they were damned forever.
sentences.cn: 你们知道, 他们俩已经永远给打入地狱了.

sentences.en: All people, she said, lived their lives in bondage to hunger, pain and lust.
sentences.cn: 她说，所有人的生活都受缚于饥饿、苦痛和欲望。

sentences.en: He is satisfied with the pleasant lust of arrogance.
sentences.cn: 他已经满足于骄傲自满的快活欲望.

sentences.en: He used her just to sate his lust.
He was filled with lust for power.
sentences.cn: 他内心充满了对权力的渴望.

sentences.en: His lust for her grew until it was overpowering.
sentences.cn: 他企图在肉体上占有她的欲望变得一发不可收拾。

sentences.en: If lust is all there is to hold you together, the relationship will never work.
sentences.cn: 如果肉欲是你们在一起的唯一理由，这种关系是不会持久的。

sentences.en: It was Fred's lust for glitz and glamour that was driving them apart.
sentences.cn: 是弗雷德对浮华、奢靡生活的强烈欲望使他们越走越远。
唯利是图的人贪求财富.

sentences.en: My feelings for Lauren were pure lust.
sentences.cn: 我对劳伦的感觉纯粹是肉欲。

sentences.en: The lust of men must not be overdone.
The lust to kill had suddenly descended on her.
The man was bitten by a lust or gain.
The mobs became driven by a crazed blood-lust to take the city.
sentences.cn: 杀红了眼的暴徒们意欲占领这座城市。

sentences.en: This is lust thinly disguised as love.
sentences.cn: 这表面是爱，其实是赤裸的欲望。

trans.tran_cn: 强烈的性欲，肉欲，色情，强烈的欲望，渴望，热烈追求
trans.tran_en: very strong sexual desire, especially when it does not include love
